DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess impact lens-free ( recovery ) interval vary lengths end-of-day comfort tear film change daily contact lens wear .
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct cross-over design two phase . Each phase consist four cycle approximately 12 hour length . During cycle , contact lens wear 2-hour interval , separate lens-free ( recovery ) intervals either 0 , 30 , 60 , 80 minute . A new pair contact lenses dispense 2-hour interval lens wear . A 12-hour lens-free wear period precede phase .
DOC.criteria: Is least 17 year age full legal capacity volunteer . Is willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule . Has ocular examination last two year . Is adapted soft contact lens wearer . Experiences decrease ocular comfort lenswearing day . Has current pair spectacle . Has distance contact lens prescription +6.00 diopter 10.00 diopter acceptable fit study lens . Has astigmatism le equal 1.00 DC . Achieves visual acuity 6/9 good study lenses habitual spectacle . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Has ocular disease . Has systemic condition may affect study outcome variable . Is use systemic topical medication may affect ocular health . Has know sensitivity diagnostic pharmaceutical use study . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
